column1: SOURCE: Social Security Administration, Supplemental Security Record, 100 percent data.
column2: NOTE: Represents period in which first payment was made, not date of entitlement to payments.
column3: a. Includes blind persons and disabled persons aged 65 or older.
column4: b. Persons who were converted in 1973 from the state Old-Age Assistance, Aid to the Blind, and Aid to the Permanently and Totally Disabled programs to the SSI program.
